Permission to access EPAM network using VPN is granted to all employees by default.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The detailed instruction on how to configure and use VPN can be found
